verses.verse: <S%G281>Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, He that <S%G1535>enters<s%> not by the <S%G2374>door<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the sheepfold, <S%G833><s%> <S%G4263><s%> but <S%G305>climbs<s%> up some <S%G237>other<s%> way, the <S%G1565>same<s%> is a <S%G2812>thief<s%> and a robber. <S%G3027><s%>
But he that <S%G1535>enters<s%> in by the <S%G2374>door<s%> is the <S%G4166>shepherd<s%> of the sheep. <S%G4263><s%>

To him the <S%G2377>porter<s%> <S%G455>opens;<s%> and the <S%G4263>sheep<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%> his <S%G5456>voice:<s%> and he <S%G2564>calls<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4263>sheep<s%> by <S%G3686>name,<s%> and <S%G1806>leads<s%> them out.

And <S%G3752>when<s%> he <S%G1544>puts<s%> <S%G1544>forth<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4263>sheep,<s%> he <S%G4198>goes<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> them, and the <S%G4263>sheep<s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> him: for they <S%G1492>know<s%> his voice. <S%G5456><s%>
And a <S%G245>stranger<s%> will they not <S%G190>follow,<s%> but will <S%G5343>flee<s%> from him: for they <S%G1492>know<s%> not the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of strangers. <S%G245><s%>
This <S%G3942>parable<s%> <S%G2036>spoke<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to them: but they <S%G1097>understood<s%> not <S%G5101>what<s%> things they were <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to them.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to them <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G281>Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G2374>door<s%> of the sheep. <S%G4263><s%>
<S%G3956>All<s%> that <S%G3745>ever<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> me are <S%G2812>thieves<s%> and <S%G3027>robbers:<s%> but the <S%G4263>sheep<s%> did not <S%G191>hear<s%> them.

I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G2374>door:<s%> by me <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G1525>enter<s%> in, he shall be <S%G4982>saved,<s%> and shall <S%G1525>go<s%> in and out, and <S%G2147>find<s%> pasture. <S%G3542><s%>

The <S%G2812>thief<s%> comes not, but for to <S%G2813>steal,<s%> and to <S%G2380>kill,<s%> and to <S%G622>destroy:<s%> I am <S%G2064>come<s%> that they might <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> and that they might have <S%G2192><s%> it more abundantly. <S%G4053><s%>
I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4166>shepherd:<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4166>shepherd<s%> <S%G5087>gives<s%> his <S%G5590>life<s%> for the sheep. <S%G4263><s%>

But he that is an <S%G3411>hireling,<s%> and not the <S%G4166>shepherd,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2398>own<s%> the <S%G4263>sheep<s%> are not, <S%G2334>sees<s%> the <S%G3074>wolf<s%> <S%G2064>coming,<s%> and <S%G863>leaves<s%> the <S%G4263>sheep,<s%> and <S%G5343>flees:<s%> and the <S%G3074>wolf<s%> <S%G726>catches<s%> them, and <S%G4650>scatters<s%> the sheep. <S%G4263><s%>
The <S%G3411>hireling<s%> <S%G5343>flees,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he is an <S%G3411>hireling,<s%> and <S%G3199>cares<s%> not for the sheep. <S%G4263><s%>
I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4166>shepherd,<s%> and <S%G1097>know<s%> my sheep, and am <S%G1097>known<s%> of mine. <S%G1699><s%>
As the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1097>knows<s%> me, <S%G2504>even<s%> so <S%G1097>know<s%> I the <S%G3962>Father:<s%> and I <S%G5087>lay<s%> down my <S%G5590>life<s%> for the sheep. <S%G4263><s%>

And <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G4263>sheep<s%> I <S%G2192>have,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> are not of <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G833>fold:<s%> them <S%G2548>also<s%> I <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G71>bring,<s%> and they shall <S%G191>hear<s%> my <S%G5456>voice;<s%> and there shall be <S%G3391>one<s%> fold, <S%G4167><s%> and <S%G1520>one<s%> shepherd. <S%G4166><s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> does my <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> me, <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G5087>lay<s%> down my <S%G5590>life,<s%> that I might <S%G2983>take<s%> it again. <S%G3825><s%>

<S%G3762>No<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G142>takes<s%> it from me, but I <S%G5087>lay<s%> it down of <S%G1683>myself.<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G5087>lay<s%> it down, and I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G2983>take<s%> it <S%G3825>again.<s%> <S%G5026>This<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> I <S%G2983>received<s%> of my Father. <S%G3962><s%>
There was a <S%G4978>division<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> for <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G3056>sayings.<s%>
And <S%G4183>many<s%> of them <S%G3004>said,<s%> He <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G1140>devil,<s%> and is <S%G3105>mad;<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%> you him?

<S%G243>Others<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5023>These<s%> are not the <S%G4487>words<s%> of him that has a <S%G1139>devil.<s%> <S%G1410>Can<s%> a <S%G1140>devil<s%> <S%G455>open<s%> the <S%G3788>eyes<s%> of the <S%G5185>blind?<s%>
And it was <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> the <S%G1456>feast<s%> of the <S%G1456>dedication,<s%> and it was <S%G5494>winter.<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4043>walked<s%> in the <S%G2411>temple<s%> in <S%G4672>Solomon's<s%> <S%G4745>porch.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2944>came<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2944>round<s%> <S%G2944>about<s%> him, and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2193>How<s%> <S%G2193>long<s%> do you <S%G142>make<s%> us to <S%G142>doubt?<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> you be the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2036>tell<s%> us <S%G3954>plainly.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> them, I <S%G2036>told<s%> you, and you <S%G4100>believed<s%> not: the <S%G2041>works<s%> that I <S%G4160>do<s%> in my <S%G3962>Father's<s%> <S%G3686>name,<s%> they <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of me.
But you <S%G4100>believe<s%> not, <S%G1063>because<s%> you are not of my <S%G4263>sheep,<s%> as I <S%G2036>said<s%> to you.
My <S%G4263>sheep<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%> my <S%G5456>voice,<s%> and I <S%G1097>know<s%> them, and they <S%G190>follow<s%> me:

And I <S%G1325>give<s%> to them <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life;<s%> and they shall never <S%G3364><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G622>perish,<s%> neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> shall any <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G726>pluck<s%> them out of my hand. <S%G5495><s%>

My <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> them me, is <S%G3187>greater<s%> than <S%G3956>all;<s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> is <S%G1410>able<s%> to pluck <S%G726><s%> them out of my <S%G3962>Father's<s%> hand. <S%G5495><s%>
I and my <S%G3962>Father<s%> are one. <S%G1520><s%>
<S%G3767>Then<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G941>took<s%> up <S%G3037>stones<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G3034>stone<s%> him.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> them, <S%G4183>Many<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> have I <S%G1166>showed<s%> you from my <S%G3962>Father;<s%> for <S%G4169>which<s%> of <S%G846>those<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> do you <S%G3034>stone<s%> me?

The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> For a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> we <S%G3034>stone<s%> you not; but for <S%G988>blasphemy;<s%> and <S%G3754>because<s%> that you, <S%G5607>being<s%> a <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> them, Is it not <S%G1125>written<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> I <S%G2036>said,<s%> You are gods? <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> he <S%G2036>called<s%> them <S%G2316>gods,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1096>came,<s%> and the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> be broken; <S%G3089><s%>

<S%G3004>Say<s%> you of him, <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> has <S%G37>sanctified,<s%> and <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> You <S%G987>blaspheme;<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G2036>said,<s%> I am the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>
<S%G1487>If<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> not the <S%G2041>works<s%> of my <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> me not.

But <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G2579>though<s%> you <S%G4100>believe<s%> not me, <S%G4100>believe<s%> the <S%G2041>works:<s%> that you may <S%G1097>know,<s%> and <S%G4100>believe,<s%> that the Father <S%G3962><s%> is in me, and I in him.
<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> they <S%G2212>sought<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G4084>take<s%> him: but he <S%G1831>escaped<s%> out of their <S%G5495>hand,<s%>

And <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G4008>beyond<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> at <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G907>baptized;<s%> and <S%G1563>there<s%> he <S%G3306>stayed.<s%>

And <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2064>resorted<s%> to him, and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G4592>miracle:<s%> but <S%G3956>all<s%> things that <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2036>spoke<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> man were <S%G227>true.<s%>
And <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> him <S%G1563>there.<s%>
